verses.verse: Bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> O my soul! <WH5315> O Lord <WH3068> my God, <WH430> Thou art very <WH3966> great; <WH1431> Thou art clothed <WH3847> with splendor <WH1935> and majesty, <WH1926>
Covering <WH5844> Thyself with light <WH216> as with a cloak, <WH8008> Stretching <WH5186> out heaven <WH8064> like a [tent] curtain. <WH3407>

He lays <WH9529> the beams <WH9529> of His upper <WH5944> chambers <WH5944> in the waters; <WH4325> He makes <WH7760> the clouds <WH5645> His chariot; <WH7398> He walks <WH1980> upon the wings <WH3671> of the wind; <WH7307>
He makes <WH6213> the winds <WH7307> His messengers, <WH4397> Flaming <WH3857> fire <WH784> His ministers. <WH8334>
He established <WH3245> the earth <WH776> upon its foundations, <WH4349> So that it will not totter <WH4131> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
Thou didst cover <WH3680> it with the deep <WH8415> as with a garment; <WH3830> The waters <WH4325> were standing <WH5975> above <WH5921> the mountains. <WH2022>
At Thy rebuke <WH1606> they fled; <WH5127> At the sound <WH6963> of Thy thunder <WH7482> they hurried <WH2648> away. <WH2648>
The mountains <WH2022> rose; <WH5927> the valleys <WH1237> sank <WH3381> down <WH3381> To the place <WH4725> which <WH2088> Thou didst establish <WH3245> for them.
Thou didst set <WH7760> a boundary <WH1366> that they may not pass <WH5674> over; <WH5674> That they may not return <WH7725> to cover <WH3680> the earth. <WH776>
He sends <WH7971> forth springs <WH4599> in the valleys; <WH5158> They flow <WH1980> between <WH996> the mountains; <WH2022>
They give <WH8248> drink <WH8248> to every <WH3605> beast <WH9130> of the field; <WH9583> The wild <WH6501> donkeys <WH6501> quench <WH7665> their thirst. <WH6772>
Beside <WH5921> them the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064> dwell; <WH7931> They lift <WH5414> up [their] voices <WH6963> among <WH4480> <WH996> the branches. <WH9423>
He waters <WH8248> the mountains <WH2022> from His upper <WH5944> chambers; <WH5944> The earth <WH776> is satisfied <WH7646> with the fruit <WH6529> of His works. <WH4639>

He causes the grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> for the cattle, <WH929> And vegetation <WH6212> for the labor <WH5656> of man, <WH120> So that he may bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> food <WH3899> from the earth, <WH776>

And wine <WH3196> which makes <WH8055> man's heart <WH3824> glad, <WH8055> So that he may make [his] face <WH6440> glisten <WH9471> with oil, <WH8081> And food <WH3899> which sustains <WH5582> man's heart. <WH3824>
The trees <WH6086> of the Lord <WH3068> drink <WH7646> their fill, <WH7646> The cedars <WH730> of Lebanon <WH3844> which <WH834> He planted, <WH5193>
Where <WH834> <WH8033> the birds <WH6833> build <WH7077> their nests, <WH7077> [And] the stork, <WH2624> whose home <WH1004> is the fir <WH1265> trees. <WH1265>
The high <WH1364> mountains <WH2022> are for the wild <WH3277> goats; <WH3277> The cliffs <WH5553> are a refuge <WH4268> for the rock <WH9627> badgers. <WH9627>
He made <WH6213> the moon <WH3394> for the seasons; <WH4150> The sun <WH8121> knows <WH3045> the place <WH3996> of its setting. <WH3996>
Thou dost appoint <WH7896> darkness <WH2822> and it becomes <WH1961> night, <WH3915> In which all <WH3605> the beasts <WH9130> of the forest <WH9194> prowl <WH7430> about. <WH7430>
The young <WH3715> lions <WH3715> roar <WH7580> after their prey, <WH2964> And seek <WH1245> their food <WH400> from God. <WH410>
[When] the sun <WH8121> rises <WH2224> they withdraw, <WH622> And lie <WH7257> down <WH7257> in their dens. <WH4585>
Man <WH120> goes <WH3318> forth <WH3318> to his work <WH6467> And to his labor <WH5656> until <WH5704> evening. <WH6153>
O Lord, <WH3068> how <WH4100> many <WH7231> are Thy works! <WH4639> In wisdom <WH2451> Thou hast made <WH6213> them all; <WH3605> The earth <WH776> is full <WH4390> of Thy possessions. <WH7075>
There <WH2088> is the sea, <WH3220> great <WH1419> and broad, <WH7342> In which <WH8033> are swarms <WH7431> without <WH369> number, <WH4557> Animals <WH9130> both small <WH6996> and great. <WH1419>
There <WH8033> the ships <WH591> move <WH1980> along, [And] Leviathan, <WH3882> which <WH2088> Thou hast formed <WH3336> to sport <WH7832> in it.
They all <WH3605> wait <WH7663> for Thee, To give <WH5414> them their food <WH400> in due season. <WH6256>
Thou dost give <WH5414> to them, they gather <WH3950> [it] up; Thou dost open <WH6605> Thy hand, <WH3027> they are satisfied <WH7646> with good. <WH9185>
Thou dost hide <WH5641> Thy face, <WH6440> they are dismayed; <WH926> Thou dost take <WH622> away <WH622> their spirit, <WH7307> they expire, <WH1478> And return <WH7725> to their dust. <WH6083>
Thou dost send <WH7971> forth Thy Spirit, <WH7307> they are created; <WH1254> And Thou dost renew <WH2318> the face <WH6440> of the ground. <WH127>
Let the glory <WH9202> of the Lord <WH3068> endure <WH1961> forever; <WH5769> Let the Lord <WH3068> be glad <WH8055> in His works; <WH4639>
He looks <WH5027> at the earth, <WH776> and it trembles; <WH7460> He touches <WH5060> the mountains, <WH2022> and they smoke. <WH6225>
I will sing <WH7891> to the Lord <WH3068> as long as I live; <WH9132> I will sing <WH2167> praise <WH2167> to my God <WH430> while <WH5750> I have my being.
Let my meditation <WH7879> be pleasing <WH6149> to Him; As for me, I shall be glad <WH8055> in the Lord. <WH3068>

Let sinners <WH2400> be consumed <WH8552> from the earth, <WH776> And let the wicked <WH7563> be no <WH369> more. <WH5750> Bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> O my soul. <WH5315> Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050>
